( sighs )

All right, I picked up

so I'll be home late.

Girls:
No milling about.

As soon as you get home,
the safeword is--

Girls:

And don't forget,

♪ I'm so fast,

Mia:
I don't know, Fredgy.

There's just too much going on
to join the dance team.

It's basically
screaming your name.

"Mia! The dance team
really wants to see ya!"
We've talked this Fredgy.

Yes, but no one will know
you're the next Beyoncé--

- Or Misty Copeland.
- Either way,

no one will know anything
if you only dance in your house

- for your little sister.
- Skylar!

Thank you. Another reason
I can't try out.

I'll pick her up
after school. Done!

Aunt Fredge is here.
Aunt Fredge is ready.
Aunt Fredge is... dancing!
Oh, okay. Okay!

I doubt I'll even make it,
though.

Okay, I think what
you're trying to do is this.
( Mia panting )
( panting )

You know there's only
one open spot, right?
Oh, um, well, it's an honor

to just write
my name on the list.

- She's been practicing.
- I saw.

Can't wait to see more
at tryouts.

- Hmm.
- Come on.

Well, um, now I am
definitely not trying out.

Did you just hear
how she said, "I saw"?
"I saw."
"Okay."

Okay, every time
I've seen you perform,
you know what I'm thinking?

"That girl is the happiest
girl in the world."

But I haven't performed in,
like, a year.

And you saw
what just happened.
I-- I froze.
It'll pass. I promise.
I am fashion. You are dance.

It's just how
this world works.

But I don't have
my lucky shoes for auditions.

And I don't have
anything to wear.
Look who you're talking to.

I'd say good luck,
but we all know

you never wish a dancer
good luck.
First up...

Thank you.

Liberty:
Thanks for coming today.

This team is the first step
in the dance number
that we like to call life--

the step that will launch
your entire career as a dancer,

so it's going to be
a serious time commitment.
We've talked it over,
and we're excited
to offer the spot to...
Mia Brooks.
